post.body: ESL is English as a second language.
Sorry for delay. Have client ready to announce new product-copyediting of all aspects of website-writers have ESL.but very good
Lizz, I just wrapped up some work for the evening and, like you, I'm grateful for the business.
Jackie you have some beautiful and interesting vintage items for sale on eBay. Love your photo display of those items.
Great post, Hal. Funny. Witty. Very good advice for couples/partners in the same business. I blogged about it too.
Hal. Love your response. Here's the Webgrammar URL: http://webgrammar.ning.com/ ...please post...you're good!
Rheumatologist: removal not necessary. Cortisone shot seems to be doing the trick. It's not quite 24 hr and pain/size diminished
Lizz, thanks for the heads up on the Voice of San Diego. Sounds like a good new trend. Nonprofit doing the San Diego news.
Hi, Joy. Busy with work, meetings, cats, and taking care of sore, sore finger joint. Dr finally discovered it's a cyst. How're U
Marc, do you mean the box with the grey background? If so, grey doesn't sell well. You might try a yellow like #FFFF80
What great photos and captions!
I'm with you, Hal. For me, hearing the Hallelujah Chorus gives me goosebumps. Did a paper on Handel in college. What a genius.
I second that, Mark. If you have something you need help with, let me know.
BL: Sammy was a miracle dog. Remember how he used to work with autistic kids, and a little boy said his first words?
Mark: I didn't interview with her. I follow her on Twitter and on some of her blog posts.
BL - I second that. A couple of years ago I waited an extra 6 months for eye check, & when checked, discovered I had glaucoma...
Thanks, Daryn. I have two animal miracle stories, which I wove into one and uploaded to your Ning forum.
Happy shopping, Mark. And happy holidays to your and your wife from Arizona.
Hey, Jeremy...can I help you with the letter? I'll even retype it for you if you want.
I voted for Help a Reporter Out in the @mashable Open Web Awards, Social News category. Vote here: http://tinyurl.com/mashablefin
CNN Heroes show was excellent. What special people!
Lizz I have several clients who are incredible businesspeople and love helping them because they have ESL.
I love you, Marc, because you love your wife and are willing to share that with us. Your entire family is blessed to have each other.
Coincidence-in my Webgrammar's forum, 2 of the 31 people are former students of Hal Cordry: http://webgrammar.ning.com/profile/HaroldVCordry
Just uploaded guest blog on potential liabilities when companies throw holiday parties: http://tinyurl.com/62u2ro
Just wrote testimonial for Canvas On Demand: sent 3 redigitized photos to be reproduced on canvas. Stunning.http://www.canvasondemand.com
Joy: R U getting abscessed tooth "fixed"? When?
Someone asked Webgrammar about procedures for listing spouses names when on charity boards or donating. Response: http://tinyurl.com/5amv5z
Lee Graham, former co-worker sent out this bulletin for Arizona Drivers: http://tinyurl.com/666of2
Just got Webgrammar ezine to Terence Kierans for formatting and coding. From AZ to OZ. TK's the best.
Daryn Kagan's forum on animal miracles is at http://tinyurl.com/5rvko4
Neglected to tell Daryn Kagan that I notified my Webgrammar forum on Ning of the animal miracle post: http://webgrammar.ning.com/
Photos of two of my granddogs in the snow in Monroe WA http://tinyurl.com/granddogs
Just posted blog on bro & sister with autism & epilepsy written by a mom who has to be the mayor of Stress City. http://tinyurl.com/48ef8e
